meta_description: Discover The Nicolaysen Art Museum in Casper, Wyoming, home to contemporary art exhibits, family-friendly programs, and educational experiences. Explore dynamic art collections, engaging events, and the hands-on Discovery Center for kids. Whether you're visiting for an exhibit or an art class, the NIC is the cultural hub of Casper, offering something for everyone. Plan your visit today and immerse yourself in art and creativity!
hours_text:
# Terms & Conditions

## Legal Disclaimer

The Nicolaysen Art Museum provides the following information as a general and high-level explanation of the museum's Terms & Conditions. This information is not intended as legal advice or specific recommendations for your individual needs. As the museum's Terms & Conditions are specific to our activities and engagements, we advise seeking legal counsel to assist in the creation of your own Terms & Conditions.

## Understanding Terms & Conditions

The Nicolaysen Art Museum's Terms and Conditions (T&C) establish the legal boundaries governing the interactions of our website visitors and patrons. These T&C reflect the unique nature of our museum's activities and are designed to define the legal relationship between our visitors and the museum. It's important to note that T&C should be tailored to the specific needs and characteristics of each organization. For instance, a museum with e-commerce activities may require different T&C compared to a museum providing information and educational resources.

## Key Elements of our T&C

Our Terms & Conditions cover a range of important aspects, including visitor access guidelines, payment methods, provisions for future changes in our offerings, warranties, intellectual property rights, our authority to suspend or terminate memberships, and much more. For detailed insights, we recommend reviewing our comprehensive guide on 'Creating a Terms and Conditions Policy'.
admission_text:
# Become a Member

### When you become a member of the Nicolaysen Art Museum, you help keep art alive and accessible in our community. Your membership supports exhibitions, Discovery Center programs, and creative experiences for all ages, while giving you year-round access to explore, connect, and create at The NIC.​​​​

Giving Tuesday is a chance to support the work we do at The NIC. Your gift helps keep exhibitions fresh, supports hands-on learning for kids and families, and makes sure our doors stay open to everyone in our community.

We also have a little something special this season. Now through December 3, when you purchase a membership, you will receive a certificate in the mail for a second membership of equal value. It’s an easy way to support The NIC while sharing art with someone you care about.

Thank you for being part of this work.

Members enjoy free admission, discounts in the Museum Store and classes, and invitations to special events throughout the year. Higher membership levels include additional guest passes, private tours, and reciprocal admission to hundreds of museums through the North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association.

STUDENT/SENIOR $30

  * Free Admission for one student or senior (over 60)

  * 10% Museum Store Discount

  * Special Events Priority List 

  * Class/Workshop discounts for Members 

INDIVIDUAL $35 

  * Free Admission for one adult 18 or older 

  * 10% Museum Store Discount 

  * Special Events Priority List 

  * Class...
collections_text:
## Welcome to   
The Nicolaysen Art Museum & Discovery   
Center in Casper, Wyoming

Located in the heart of Downtown Casper, The Nicolaysen Art Museum (The NIC) is a vibrant cultural hub dedicated to contemporary art and education. Our mission is to collect, preserve, and exhibit the work of contemporary artists, inspiring creativity, dialogue, and learning. Whether you're visiting for an exciting exhibit, a family-friendly art program, or a hands-on experience in our Discovery Center, The NIC offers something for everyone.

### Upcoming Events
